item.title: Linux Mint and Gnome keyring
item.description: TL;DR Follow what it says https://wiki.gnome.org/Projects/GnomeKeyring/Ssh#Automatically_loading_SSH_Keys but instead of copying your keys into .ssh, just symlink them ln -s /path/to/private.pem /home/user/.ssh/id_rsa # link private key ln -s /path/to/private.pem.pub /home/user/.ssh/id_rsa.pub # link public key (you NEED to do this too) Background what’s the situation? The problem what’s the specific problem? The solution how’d you fix it?
